articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: tSeg2D
description: The `tSeg2D` object tests the position of a "mass" relative to a defined 2D line segment. It takes the mass's coordinates and outputs a binary (0 or 1) value indicating whether the mass is interacting with the segment, considering parameters like segment points and interaction depth. It's designed for spatial relationship testing in a 2D environment.
